Literature.Title: RYH: a minimal peptidic sequence obtained from beta-chain hemoglobin exhibiting an antimicrobial activity.
Literature.Author: Catiau L, Traisnel J, Chihib NE, Le Flem G, Blanpain A, Melnyk O, Guillochon D, Nedjar-Arroume N

Literature.Title: A Head-to-Head Comparison of the Antimicrobial Activities of 30 Ultra-Short Antimicrobial Peptides Against Staphylococcus aureus, Pseudomonas aeruginosa and Candida albicans
Literature.Author: Lau QY, Choo XY, Lim ZX, Kong XN, Ng FM, Ang M, Hill J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis(MIC=1µM),Escherichia coli(MIC=4µM),Listeria innocua(MIC=1µM),Micrococcus luteus(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 100(MIC=>100µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=>100µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=>100µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=>100µM)
